https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1UmPJWfaivtNjsScJqcsbsQRGNY.jpg Bruce Wayne is missing. Alfred covers for him while Nightwing and Robin patrol Gotham City in his stead and a new player, Batwoman, investigates Batman's disappearance. Batman: Bad Blood
